name: War of the Monsters
description:
Experience War of the Monsters™ for PS2™ system with 1080p up-rendering and Trophies. Additional enhanced features include Shareplay, Remote Play, Activity Feeds and Second Screen support for game manuals with PS Vita system or PS App.
Stare in disbelief! Scream in Horror! Run for your life!
100-foot tall monsters have stormed the world, causing panic and despair! Engage in a savage battle, these behemoths won’t let anything stand in their way. Which one will win this War of the Monsters?
10 Massively destructive monsters!!!
13 Fully destructible environments!
Run through cities, scale skyscrapers and jump from rooftop to rooftop. Go anywhere and everywhere.
Unlimited weapons!
Scour the battlefield for cars, steel girders and building rubble to pummel opponents.
Advanced fighting system!
Use Weapons, shoot projectiles, Block and counter attack.
2 Player split screen merges into one
for full screen brawling.
Unlock bonus monsters, levels and mini-games!
